CustomField.description: Project Schedule options include simple, native, and none. Simple assumes Saturdays and Sundays are non-working days, advanced references Business Hours defined in Salesforce Setup, and none makes every day of the week a working day. For native, schedules defined through Business Hours are connected through the Project Schedule lookup field on projects.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines working and non-working days for scheduling tasks. "None" treats every day as a working day; "simple" sets Saturdays and Sundays as non-working days; "native" allows linking custom business hour schedules and holidays to projects.
CustomField.label: Project Schedule
